## Checklist

- [ ] SKILL.md has valid YAML frontmatter (`name`, `description`)
- [ ] Frontmatter `name` matches folder name
- [ ] Skill passes `./bin/validate.sh`
- [ ] No internal file paths, API keys, or secrets
- [ ] No investment advice without disclaimers
- [ ] Content is educational and agent-friendly
- [ ] README.md catalog updated (if new skill)
- [ ] Minimum 100 lines with tables and examples
